name: Binding Vows (get it)
description: Your immense cursed energy dabbles in eternity and keep the dead partly intact... at your expense.

badges.text:
Hunters you kill have a §adelayed§r respawn but
they §ckeep§r their armors and tools/weapons.
Additionally, kept items have §cCurse of Deterioration §rapplied.
§cCurse of Deterioration§r: Items equipped/held lose durability over time and exhaust you.
